events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada
events.wd_label: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada
events.wd_description: India has directed Canada to withdraw close to 40 diplomatic staff and confirmed those who stayed past October 10 would lose their diplomatic immunity.
events.description: India has directed Canada to withdraw close to 40 diplomatic staff and confirmed those who stayed past October 10 would lose their diplomatic immunity.

events.name: Diplomatic staff withdrawal
events.wd_description: India has instructed Canada to withdraw nearly 40 diplomatic staff from the country, with a deadline of October 10 for maintaining diplomatic immunity.
events.description: India has instructed Canada to withdraw nearly 40 diplomatic staff from the country, with a deadline of October 10 for maintaining diplomatic immunity.

events.name: Allegations of involvement in killing
events.wd_description: Canada accused India of involvement in the killing of Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar on Canadian soil, an allegation denied by India.
events.description: Canada accused India of involvement in the killing of Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar on Canadian soil, an allegation denied by India.

events.name: Trudeau's response
events.wd_description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau stated that he does not plan to escalate the rift with India and emphasized ongoing responsible and constructive engagement.
events.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau stated that he does not plan to escalate the rift with India and emphasized ongoing responsible and constructive engagement.

events.name: EVs and the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election
events.wd_label: EVs and the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election
events.wd_description: Electric vehicles have become a contentious issue in the 2024 U.S. presidential race, with Republican candidates criticizing EV policies while Democrats emphasize job creation and investment benefits.
events.description: Electric vehicles have become a contentious issue in the 2024 U.S. presidential race, with Republican candidates criticizing EV policies while Democrats emphasize job creation and investment benefits.

events.name: Republican Criticism
events.wd_description: Republican contenders for the 2024 presidential nomination, including Trump and DeSantis, have criticized EVs, arguing they harm American jobs and benefit China.
events.description: Republican contenders for the 2024 presidential nomination, including Trump and DeSantis, have criticized EVs, arguing they harm American jobs and benefit China.

events.name: Trump's Position
events.wd_description: Trump has labeled EVs as a "hoax" and argues that they are strengthening China's economy at the expense of American jobs.
events.description: Trump has labeled EVs as a "hoax" and argues that they are strengthening China's economy at the expense of American jobs.

events.name: DeSantis's Position
events.wd_description: DeSantis has criticized EVs for making the U.S. more dependent on China, reflecting general Republican concerns about EV technology and subsidies.
events.description: DeSantis has criticized EVs for making the U.S. more dependent on China, reflecting general Republican concerns about EV technology and subsidies.

events.name: General Republican Sentiment
events.wd_description: Republicans view IRA subsidies as government overreach and express concern over EV manufacturing's reliance on minerals from China.
events.description: Republicans view IRA subsidies as government overreach and express concern over EV manufacturing's reliance on minerals from China.

events.name: Democratic Response
events.wd_description: Democrats, including President Biden, are emphasizing the job creation and economic benefits of EV investments to gain support in key battleground states.
events.description: Democrats, including President Biden, are emphasizing the job creation and economic benefits of EV investments to gain support in key battleground states.

events.name: Biden's Campaign Strategy
events.wd_description: Biden has promoted the IRA in ads and visits to manufacturing facilities, highlighting the job creation from EV and battery investments.
events.description: Biden has promoted the IRA in ads and visits to manufacturing facilities, highlighting the job creation from EV and battery investments.

events.name: Local Democratic Efforts
events.wd_description: Democratic candidates in states like Arizona are focusing on the jobs created by EV investments and their positive local impacts.
events.description: Democratic candidates in states like Arizona are focusing on the jobs created by EV investments and their positive local impacts.

events.name: State-Level Nuances
events.wd_description: Some Republican state leaders, like Georgia's Governor Brian Kemp, support state-level incentives for EV projects despite opposing the IRA, complicating the political narrative.
events.description: Some Republican state leaders, like Georgia's Governor Brian Kemp, support state-level incentives for EV projects despite opposing the IRA, complicating the political narrative.

events.name: Kemp's Position
events.wd_description: Governor Brian Kemp has promoted state tax credits for EV manufacturers and aims to make Georgia the "electric mobility capital" of America.
events.description: Governor Brian Kemp has promoted state tax credits for EV manufacturers and aims to make Georgia the "electric mobility capital" of America.

events.name: Local Political Dynamics
events.wd_description: The support for EV projects by state-level Republicans adds complexity to the Democrats' efforts to claim credit for job creation through the IRA.
events.description: The support for EV projects by state-level Republicans adds complexity to the Democrats' efforts to claim credit for job creation through the IRA.

events.name: Market Impact
events.wd_description: Investments in EV and battery manufacturing have surged, driven by the IRA, although high interest rates and supply chain concerns present challenges.
events.description: Investments in EV and battery manufacturing have surged, driven by the IRA, although high interest rates and supply chain concerns present challenges.

events.name: EV Investment Figures
events.wd_description: There have been roughly $128 billion in investments in domestic EV and battery manufacturing since the 2022 passage of the Inflation Reduction Act.
events.description: There have been roughly $128 billion in investments in domestic EV and battery manufacturing since the 2022 passage of the Inflation Reduction Act.

events.name: Challenges and Opportunities
events.wd_description: High interest rates have dampened demand, but domestic EV sales remain strong, with EVs expected to make up nearly 50% of car sales in America by 2030.
events.description: High interest rates have dampened demand, but domestic EV sales remain strong, with EVs expected to make up nearly 50% of car sales in America by 2030.
